text: Ayesha Shahriyar Mohammed Al-Balooshi (born ) is an Emirati female weightlifter, competing in the 58 kg category and representing United Arab Emirates at international competitions. She competed at world championships, most recently at the 2014 World Weightlifting Championships. She placed 16th in the women's 58 kg event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. She won the silver medal at the 2011 Pan Arab Games but was caught using performance-enhancing drugs and was stripped of her medal.Athletes Test Posivtive for Doping at Arab Games The Daily Star.
